Our Barcelona favorite!  This restaurant has both a Tapas and a full restaurant.  After 3 a hour lunch of some of the most flavorfull, colorful, beautifully table served dishes, we walked away still discussing what we could have also had...  As we sat down, we were treated with artfully tapped and pulled hard cider.  This is one of the Basque specialties.We enjoyed all four of the daily specials...  Who would have thought that Kidney beans could be exciting...but they were not only very tasty, but the the table side presentation made it fun.  And we also added some of the standard menu items.  Every dish was as good as the last, and all were beautifully plated.Make this one of the restaurants you seek out when in Barcelona!
